alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. Helena, northern Livingston, southeastern East Feliciana, west central Tangipahoa and northeastern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 900 PM CDT... At 815 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montpelier, or near Greensburg, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Amite City, Roseland, Albany, Montpelier, Pride, Watson and Greenwell Spring. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 45 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena
